Package entity

Class AbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.AbstractEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Butterfly, Chicken, Hedgehog, Hero, Spike

    public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
    Base class for entities Implements some Entity methods to avoid code repetition
